open.title: Vumatel installation and maintenance problems | Khayelitsha & Delft
open.description: We would like to inform you about the challenges that we are currently experiencing with installation & maintenance activities in the Khayelitsha and Delft areas, Western Cape. Due to increased violence in this area, our contractor partners are not able to freely access the area to work. All maintenance and installation activities in this area will be on hold until further notice. The safety of our contractor partners remains our priority.

open.title: Clear Access Maintenance | Hatfield
open.description: Clear Access is conducting maintenance in Hatfield on the 15th October 2024 from 23:00 to 04:00 16 October 2024, users affected will experience limited to no connectivity during the maintenance window. We apologize for any inconvenience caused.

open.title: MetroFibre| Prince Valley, Beaufort West
open.description: MetroFibre is conducting maintenance in Prince Valley, Beaufort West on Monday, 14th October 2024 from 08:00 to 18:00 GMT +2 users affected will experience limited to no connectivity during the maintenance window. We apologize for any inconvenience caused.
